net.minecraftforge.eventbus

クラス EventBus

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.minecraftforge.eventbus.EventBus

extends java.lang.Object
implements IEventExceptionHandler, IEventBus

    • コンストラクタの詳細

    • メソッドの詳細

      • register

        public void register(java.lang.Object target)
        インタフェースからコピーされた説明: IEventBus
        Register an instance object or a Class, and add listeners for all SubscribeEvent annotated methods found there. Depending on what is passed as an argument, different listener creation behaviour is performed.
        Object Instance
        Scanned for non-static methods annotated with SubscribeEvent and creates listeners for each method found.
        Class Instance
        Scanned for static methods annotated with SubscribeEvent and creates listeners for each method found.
        定義:
        register インタフェース内 IEventBus
        パラメータ:
        target - Either a Class instance or an arbitrary object, for scanning and event listener creation

      • addListener

        public <T extends Event> void addListener(java.util.function.Consumer<T> consumer)
        インタフェースからコピーされた説明: IEventBus
        Add a consumer listener with default EventPriority.NORMAL and not recieving cancelled events.
        定義:
        addListener インタフェース内 IEventBus
        型パラメータ:
        T - The Event subclass to listen for
        パラメータ:
        consumer - Callback to invoke when a matching event is received

      • addListener

        public <T extends Event> void addListener(EventPriority priority,
                                          java.util.function.Consumer<T> consumer)
        インタフェースからコピーされた説明: IEventBus
        Add a consumer listener with the specified EventPriority and not receiving cancelled events.
        定義:
        addListener インタフェース内 IEventBus
        型パラメータ:
        T - The Event subclass to listen for
        パラメータ:
        priority - EventPriority for this listener
        consumer - Callback to invoke when a matching event is received

      • addListener

        public <T extends Event> void addListener(EventPriority priority,
                                          boolean receiveCancelled,
                                          java.util.function.Consumer<T> consumer)
        インタフェースからコピーされた説明: IEventBus
        Add a consumer listener with the specified EventPriority and potentially cancelled events.
        定義:
        addListener インタフェース内 IEventBus
        型パラメータ:
        T - The Event subclass to listen for
        パラメータ:
        priority - EventPriority for this listener
        receiveCancelled - Indicate if this listener should receive events that have been Cancelable cancelled
        consumer - Callback to invoke when a matching event is received

      • addListener

        public <T extends Event> void addListener(EventPriority priority,
                                          boolean receiveCancelled,
                                          java.lang.Class<T> eventType,
                                          java.util.function.Consumer<T> consumer)
        インタフェースからコピーされた説明: IEventBus
        Add a consumer listener with the specified EventPriority and potentially cancelled events. Use this method when one of the other methods fails to determine the concrete Event subclass that is intended to be subscribed to.
        定義:
        addListener インタフェース内 IEventBus
        型パラメータ:
        T - The Event subclass to listen for
        パラメータ:
        priority - EventPriority for this listener
        receiveCancelled - Indicate if this listener should receive events that have been Cancelable cancelled
        eventType - The concrete Event subclass to subscribe to
        consumer - Callback to invoke when a matching event is received

      • addGenericListener

        public <T extends GenericEvent<? extends F>,F> void addGenericListener(java.lang.Class<F> genericClassFilter,
                                                                       java.util.function.Consumer<T> consumer)
        インタフェースからコピーされた説明: IEventBus
        Add a consumer listener for a GenericEvent subclass, filtered to only be called for the specified filter Class.
        定義:
        addGenericListener インタフェース内 IEventBus
        型パラメータ:
        T - The GenericEvent subclass to listen for
        F - The Class to filter the GenericEvent for
        パラメータ:
        genericClassFilter - A Class which the GenericEvent should be filtered for
        consumer - Callback to invoke when a matching event is received

      • addGenericListener

        public <T extends GenericEvent<? extends F>,F> void addGenericListener(java.lang.Class<F> genericClassFilter,
                                                                       EventPriority priority,
                                                                       java.util.function.Consumer<T> consumer)
        インタフェースからコピーされた説明: IEventBus
        Add a consumer listener with the specified EventPriority and not receiving cancelled events, for a GenericEvent subclass, filtered to only be called for the specified filter Class.
        定義:
        addGenericListener インタフェース内 IEventBus
        型パラメータ:
        T - The GenericEvent subclass to listen for
        F - The Class to filter the GenericEvent for
        パラメータ:
        genericClassFilter - A Class which the GenericEvent should be filtered for
        priority - EventPriority for this listener
        consumer - Callback to invoke when a matching event is received

      • addGenericListener

        public <T extends GenericEvent<? extends F>,F> void addGenericListener(java.lang.Class<F> genericClassFilter,
                                                                       EventPriority priority,
                                                                       boolean receiveCancelled,
                                                                       java.util.function.Consumer<T> consumer)
        インタフェースからコピーされた説明: IEventBus
        Add a consumer listener with the specified EventPriority and potentially cancelled events, for a GenericEvent subclass, filtered to only be called for the specified filter Class.
        定義:
        addGenericListener インタフェース内 IEventBus
        型パラメータ:
        T - The GenericEvent subclass to listen for
        F - The Class to filter the GenericEvent for
        パラメータ:

        receiveCancelled - Indicate if this listener should receive events that have been Cancelable cancelled
        consumer - Callback to invoke when a matching event is received

      • addGenericListener

        public <T extends GenericEvent<? extends F>,F> void addGenericListener(java.lang.Class<F> genericClassFilter,
                                                                       EventPriority priority,
                                                                       boolean receiveCancelled,
                                                                       java.lang.Class<T> eventType,
                                                                       java.util.function.Consumer<T> consumer)
        インタフェースからコピーされた説明: IEventBus
        Add a consumer listener with the specified EventPriority and potentially cancelled events, for a GenericEvent subclass, filtered to only be called for the specified filter Class. Use this method when one of the other methods fails to determine the concrete GenericEvent subclass that is intended to be subscribed to.
        定義:
        addGenericListener インタフェース内 IEventBus
        型パラメータ:
        T - The GenericEvent subclass to listen for
        F - The Class to filter the GenericEvent for
        パラメータ:
        genericClassFilter - A Class which the GenericEvent should be filtered for
        priority - EventPriority for this listener
        receiveCancelled - Indicate if this listener should receive events that have been Cancelable cancelled
        eventType - The concrete GenericEvent subclass to subscribe to
        consumer - Callback to invoke when a matching event is received

      • unregister

        public void unregister(java.lang.Object object)
        インタフェースからコピーされた説明: IEventBus
        Unregister the supplied listener from this EventBus. Removes all listeners from events. NOTE: Consumers can be stored in a variable if unregistration is required for the Consumer.
        定義:
        unregister インタフェース内 IEventBus
        パラメータ:
        object - The object, Class or Consumer to unsubscribe.

      • post

        public boolean post(Event event)
        インタフェースからコピーされた説明: IEventBus
        Submit the event for dispatch to appropriate listeners
        定義:
        post インタフェース内 IEventBus
        パラメータ:
        event - The event to dispatch to listeners
        戻り値:
        true if the event was Cancelable cancelled

      • handleException

        public void handleException(IEventBus bus,
                            Event event,
                            IEventListener[] listeners,
                            int index,
                            java.lang.Throwable throwable)
        インタフェースからコピーされた説明: IEventExceptionHandler
        Fired when a EventListener throws an exception for the specified event on the event bus. After this function returns, the original Throwable will be propagated upwards.
        定義:
        handleException インタフェース内 IEventExceptionHandler
        パラメータ:
        bus - The bus the event is being fired on
        event - The event that is being fired
        listeners - All listeners that are listening for this event, in order
        index - Index for the current listener being fired.
        throwable - The throwable being thrown

      • shutdown

        public void shutdown()
        インタフェースからコピーされた説明: IEventBus
        Shuts down this event bus. No future events will be fired on this event bus, so any call to IEventBus.post(Event) will be a no op after this method has been invoked
        定義:
        shutdown インタフェース内 IEventBus

      • start

        public void start()
        定義:
        start インタフェース内 IEventBus
